answers.author: Laura Hagg
answers.text:
Hi Michelle - great question.  Can you elaborate a bit more?  Are you looking at an online forum? or an in person conference? Are you interested in elected local leaders? or professional local managers?  ICMA has been conducting city to city partnerships for more than 15 years and find it one of the most successful ways to build capacity and enable positive change in communities.  What type of technology are you hoping that cities adopt?  We also have a Center for Sustainable Communities that may also be a resource.

author: Michelle Cullen
text: I work for an organization that is exploring the idea of setting up a peer-to-peer learning forum for city leaders so that they can share experiences around adopting smart technologies. Can anyone recommend best practices / lessons learned around city leaders peer-to-peer learning? And, do you think a resource like this might be useful?
title: City leader peer-to-peer learning best practices
